Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description:
AP: 2
Range: 1.5m/9m
Deals 1d4 slashing/piercing damage (19-20:+0).
Roll 1d20 #ST#/#AT# to touch.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description:
AP: 3
Range: 1.5m
Deals 1d8 #S# blunt damag.e
Roll 1d20 #ST# to touch.

Pistol.name: Pistol
Pistol.description:
AP: 3
Range: 9m
Deals 1d8 #A# piercing damage.
Roll 1d20 #AT# to touch.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description:
AP: 2
Range: Self
+1 Dodge for 1 turn.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description:
AP: 3
Range: 1.5m
Deals 1d6 #S# slashing damage (19-20:+0).
Roll 1d20 #ST# to touch.

Axe.name: Axe
Axe.description:
AP: 3
Range: 1.5m
Deals 1d6 #S# slashing damage (20:+20).
Roll 1d20 #ST# to touch.

Elemental whip.name: Elemental whip
Elemental whip.description:
AP: 3
Range: 3m
Deals 1d6 #I# elemental damage.
Roll 1d20 #PT# to touch.

Elemental wand.name: Elemental wand
Elemental wand.description:
AP: 3
Range: 9m
Deals 1d8 #I# elemental damage.
Roll 1d20 #PT# to touch.

Greathammer.name: Greathammer
Greathammer.description:
AP: 4
Range: 1.5m
Deals 1d12 #S2H# blunt damage.
Roll 1d20 #ST# to touch.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description:
AP: 4
Range: 3m
Deals 1d10 #S2H# piercing damage.
Roll 1d20 #ST# to touch.

Long bow.name: Long bow
Long bow.description:
AP: 4
Range: 30m
Deals 1d10 #A# piercing damage.
Roll 1d20 #AT# to touch.

Rifle.name: Rifle
Rifle.description:
AP: 4
Range: 100m
Deals 1d8 #A# piercing damage.
Roll 1d20 #AT# to touch.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description:
AP: 4
Range: 1.5m
Deals 1d10 #S2H# slashing damage (19-20:+0).
Roll 1d20 #ST# to touch.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description:
AP: 4
Range: 1.5m
Deals 1d10 #S2H# slashing damage (20:+20).
Roll 1d20 #ST# to touch.

Elemental staff.name: Elemental staff
Elemental staff.description:
AP: 4
Range: 30m
Deals 1d10 #I# elemental damage
Roll 1d20 #PT# to touch

Glue (5sp).name: Glue
Glue (5sp).description:
Capacity: 30cm²
Athletics: DC 10 (15 if glued surface > 1.5m²)

Manacles (15gp).name: Manacles
Manacles (15gp).description:
Athletics checks: DC 30
Technique or Misdemeanor checks: DC 20

Empty vial (1gp).name: Vial
Empty vial (1gp).description: A vial with a capacity of 25cL.

Oil flask (1gp).name: Oil flask
Oil flask (1gp).description: A flask that contains oil. Its oil capacity is equivalent to 1.5m² once spilled on the ground.

Lock (1pp).name: Lock
Lock (1pp).description:
Resistance: 10
HP: 5
Athletics check: DC 25
Misdemeanor check: DC 20

Paper sheet (4sp).name: Paper sheet
Paper sheet (4sp).description: Its paper. What did you expect?

First-aid kit (2gp).name: First-aid kit
First-aid kit (2gp).description: One use only. +2 to Technique checks that involve healing.

Ink vial (8gp).name: Ink vial
Ink vial (8gp).description: Black ink to write on paper

Lantern (7gp).name: Lantern
Lantern (7gp).description: Oil lantern that can light up an area up to 6m away from user.

Shovel (2gp).name: Regular Shovel. Perfect for a Knight wannabe, just don't hop on it. No really, don't.

Pickaxe (3gp).name: Pickaxe
Pickaxe (3gp).description: Regular Pickaxe. Now, you've picked yours.

Chalk (1cp).name: Chalk
Chalk (1cp).description: Small chalk, easily breakable, rather noisy.

Cards (2sp).name: Cards
Cards (2sp).description: Tarot Nouveau gaming deck. Usable for cartomancy or playing purposes.

Havenbag.name: Haven Bag
Havenbag.description:
Mysterious bag with a capacity of 25kg. Items placed within this bag will warp to its special pocket dimension. 
Its weight remains the same regardless of which item is placed inside. Don't try anything stupid...

Alchemist\u2019s kit (75gp).name: Alchemist’s kit
Alchemist\u2019s kit (75gp).description: Allows user to synthesize alchemical substances. Grants +1 to Technique checks involving alchemy.

Minor poison.name: Minor poison
Minor poison.description:
Applies the following effect on the character's weapon for their next attack: 
"2d4+2 acid damage - DC 12".

Death poison.name: Death poison
Death poison.description:
Only enabled if target orally ingests the poison.
Effect onset = 10min
Duration: 6min
Each minute: -1d4 Constitution
DC 15

Paralysis poison.name: Paralysis poison
Paralysis poison.description:
Applies the following effect on the character's weapon for their next attack: 
"-3m/AP for 2 rounds - DC 15".

Catstraw.name: Catstraw
Catstraw.description:
AP: 3 (self), 6 (others).
Removes disadvantages on Perception checks in dim areas for 3 hours.

Acid vial.name: Acid vial
Acid vial.description:
AP: 2
Range: 9m
Deals 1d6 acid damage within a 1.5m radius.
Dodge save: DC 12

Atlantean fire.name: Atlantean fire
Atlantean fire.description:
AP: 2
Range: 9m
Deals 1d6 fire damage within a 1.5m radius.
Dodge save: DC 12

Flash grenade.name: Flash grenade
Flash grenade.description:
AP: 2
Range: 9m
Grants -2 Dodge for 2 rounds within a 1.5m radius. 
Constitution save: DC 12

Thunder stone.name: Thunder stone
Thunder stone.description:
AP: 2
Range: 9m
Grants -2 Resilience for 2 rounds within a 1.5m radius.
Constitution save: DC 12

Smoke grenade.name: Smoke grenade
Smoke grenade.description:
AP: 2
Range: 9m
Creates a 3m x 3m x 3m cube of smoke for 3 turns.

Antidote.name: Antidote
Antidote.description:
AP: 2 (self), 4 (others)
Grants advantage againts disease saves for 3 hours.

Adventurer's kit (10gp).name: Adventurer's kit
Adventurer's kit (10gp).description: This kit includes a backpack, a bedroll, a belt pouch, a flint and steel, a needle, a whistle, 1m of string, a whetstone, a soap and a waterskin.
